## SLCH002

```{r SLCH002-data-load}

sl02_data <- read_csv(path(here(), './data/ieeg_behave/SLCH002_raw_behave.csv'), col_types = cols(X1 = col_double(),
                                                                                              Subject = col_character(),
                                                                                              Trial = col_character(),
                                                                                              Lives = col_double(),
                                                                                              Trial_on_off = col_double(),
                                                                                              TrialType = col_double(),
                                                                                              Time = col_double(),
                                                                                              GhostLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              UserLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              Direction = col_double(),
                                                                                              Biscuit1 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit2 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit3 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit4 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit5 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Attack = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Chase = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Eaten = col_double(),
                                                                                              Score = col_double()))


```

```{r SLCH002-data-prep}


# clean df #
sl02_data_clean <- clean_bci_data(sl02_data, 2000)

# create distance df # 
sl02_data_distance <- create_distance_df_bci(sl02_data_clean)

sl02_data_distance_no_ghost <- create_distance_df_bci(sl02_data_clean, ghost = F)

# round trial time to match theta analyses #
sl02_data_distance <- sl02_data_distance %>%
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))
  
sl02_data_distance_no_ghost <- sl02_data_distance_no_ghost %>%
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))


```

```{r bheave-cors}

behave_correl_data <- sl02_data_distance %>%
  select(distance_to_ghost, discounted_reward, UserLocation, GhostLocation) 
  
behavioral_cor <- cor(behave_correl_data, use = "pairwise.complete.obs")
  
ggcorrplot(behavioral_cor,
             lab = T,
             type = "lower",
             colors = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, "RdBu"))(3)) +
  ggtitle("SLCH002 Behavioral Correlations")


```


```{r aalen-basics}

sl02_data_aalen <- create_subject_survival_aalen(sl02_data_distance %>% mutate(trial_time = as.numeric(trial_time)), "SLCH002")


basic_aalen_fit <- survfit(Surv(time1, time2, status) ~  1, data=sl02_data_aalen, type = "fleming-harrington")

ggsurvplot(basic_aalen_fit) +
  ggtitle("SLCH002 Survival Curve")


```

```{r full-aalen-models, eval = F}


aareg_full_model_1 <- aareg(Surv( time1, time2, status) ~  
              cdf_distance + discounted_reward + Score + Lives +
              jittered_start_location + Direction,
              data=sl02_data_aalen)

aareg_full_model_2 <- aareg(Surv( time1, time2, status) ~  
              cdf_distance + distance_to_next_reward + Score + Lives +
              jittered_start_location + Direction,
              data=sl02_data_aalen)

aareg_full_model_3 <- aareg(Surv( time1, time2, status) ~  
              distance_to_ghost + discounted_reward + 
              UserLocation + GhostLocation +
              Score + Lives +
              jittered_start_location ,
              data=sl02_data_aalen)

aareg_full_model_4 <- aareg(Surv( time1, time2, status) ~  
              distance_to_ghost + distance_to_next_reward + Score + Lives +
              jittered_start_location + Direction,
              data=sl02_data_aalen, dfbeta = TRUE)


aareg_full_model_1 %>%
  broom::tidy() %>%
  mutate(p_sig = p.value < .05) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()

aareg_full_model_2 %>%
  broom::tidy() %>%
  mutate(p_sig = p.value < .05) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()

aareg_full_model_3 %>%
  broom::tidy() %>%
  mutate(p_sig = p.value < .05) %>%
  kable(table.attr = "style = \"color: black;\"") %>%
  kable_styling()  %>%
  add_header_above(c("SLCH002: Survival Model" = 7))

aareg_full_model_4 %>%
  broom::tidy() %>%
  mutate(p_sig = p.value < .05) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()

residuals(aareg_full_model_4)

# plot beta coefficients
autoplot(aareg_full_model_4) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"))
```

## Hippocampus

```{r hc-elecs}

# shift <- 20
shift <- 0
hc_elecs <- list.files(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "hc", "SLCH002"))

slchool2_trial_theta_results <- tibble()
for(file in hc_elecs){

  print(file)
  
  elec_theta_data <- read_csv(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "hc", "SLCH002", file))
  
   # fix col names
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    select(-X1)
  colnames(elec_theta_data) <- c(paste0("bin_", colnames(elec_theta_data)[1:181]), 'trial_numeric')
  
  # pivot
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    pivot_longer(names_to = 'bin', values_to = 'theta', cols = starts_with("bin")) %>%
    mutate(bin = as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>%
    mutate(bin = paste0("bin_", if_else(bin - shift > -1, bin - shift, 999))) %>%
    filter(bin != "bin_999") %>%
    mutate(trial_numeric = trial_numeric + 1) %>%
    mutate(trial_time = .05 * as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>% 
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))  %>% 
    select(-bin)
    
  
  # merge 
  elec_full_data <- inner_join(elec_theta_data, sl02_data_distance)
  
  elec_full_data <- elec_full_data %>%
     mutate(trial_numeric = factor(trial_numeric))
 
  
  ## Basic models
  
  # threat model
  threat_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Direction + Time +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(threat_model))
  summary_model <- summary(threat_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "threat") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # aac model
  aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Time +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # reward model
  reward_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Direction + Time +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_model))
  summary_model <- summary(reward_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## Interaction
  
  ## threat, aac
  threat_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Time +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(threat_aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(threat_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "threat_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## reward, aac
  reward_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Time +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_aac_model))  
  summary_model <- summary(reward_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # full model
  full_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + towards_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Time +
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(full_model))
  summary_model <- summary(full_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "full") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
  
  
  # fullish model
  fullish_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Time +
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(fullish_model))
  summary_model <- summary(fullish_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "fullish") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
    


}

```

```{r across-electrodes-prep}
elec_full_data_all_elecs <- NULL

   # fix col names
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    select(-X1)
  colnames(elec_theta_data) <- c(paste0("bin_", colnames(elec_theta_data)[1:181]), 'trial_numeric')
  
  # pivot
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    pivot_longer(names_to = 'bin', values_to = 'theta', cols = starts_with("bin")) %>%
    mutate(bin = as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>%
    mutate(bin = paste0("bin_", if_else(bin - shift > -1, bin - shift, 999))) %>%
    filter(bin != "bin_999") %>%
    mutate(trial_numeric = trial_numeric + 1) %>%
    mutate(trial_time = .05 * as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>% 
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))  %>% 
    select(-bin)
    
  
  # merge 
  elec_full_data <- inner_join(elec_theta_data, sl02_data_distance)
  
  elec_full_data <- elec_full_data %>%
     mutate(trial_numeric = factor(trial_numeric)) %>%
    mutate(electrode = file)
  
  # rbind
  elec_full_data_all_elecs <- rbind(elec_full_data_all_elecs, elec_full_data)

}

  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
```

## Cingulate

```{r cingulate-regressions}
threat_function <- distributions3::Beta(2, 5.5)

cing_elecs <- list.files(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "cing", "SLCH002"))

slchool2_trial_theta_results <- tibble()
for(file in cing_elecs){

  print(file)
  
  elec_theta_data <- read_csv(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "cing", "SLCH002", file))
  
  # fix col names
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    select(-X1)
  colnames(elec_theta_data) <- c(paste0("bin_", colnames(elec_theta_data)[1:181]), 'trial_numeric')
  
  # pivot
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    pivot_longer(names_to = 'bin', values_to = 'theta', cols = starts_with("bin")) %>%
    mutate(bin = as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>%
    mutate(bin = paste0("bin_", if_else(bin - shift > -1, bin - shift, 999))) %>%
    filter(bin != "bin_999") %>%
    mutate(trial_numeric = trial_numeric + 1) %>%
    mutate(trial_time = .05 * as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>% 
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))  %>% 
    select(-bin)
    
  
  # merge 
  elec_full_data <- inner_join(elec_theta_data, sl02_data_distance)
  
  elec_full_data  <- elec_full_data %>%
    mutate(trial_time = as.numeric(trial_time)) %>%
    # get rid of no ghost
    filter(TrialType <= 16) %>%
    # filter out anything after last away
    mutate(trial_numeric = factor(trial_numeric)) %>%
    mutate(cdf_distance = distributions3::cdf(threat_function, distance_to_ghost/100)) %>%
    mutate(Direction = factor(Direction)) %>%
    mutate(discounted_reward = if_else(Eaten == 5, 0, points_remaining * 1/distance_to_next_reward))
  
  
  # only before last turn around, less total trials because excluding trials where pacman died
  elec_before_turn <- elec_full_data %>%
    mutate(trial_time = as.numeric(trial_time)) %>%
    # get rid of no ghost
    filter(TrialType <= 16) %>%
    # filter out anything after last away
    group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
    filter(trial_time <= max(trial_time[away_choice == last_away])) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(trial_numeric = factor(trial_numeric)) %>%
    mutate(cdf_distance = distributions3::cdf(threat_function, distance_to_ghost/100)) 
  
  
  ## Basic models
  
  # threat model
  threat_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Direction + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(threat_model))
  summary_model <- summary(threat_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "threat") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # aac model
  aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # reward model
  reward_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Direction + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_model))
  summary_model <- summary(reward_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## Interaction
  
  ## threat, aac
  threat_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(threat_aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(threat_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "threat_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## reward, aac
  reward_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_aac_model))  
  summary_model <- summary(reward_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # full model
  full_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + towards_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(full_model))
  summary_model <- summary(full_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "full") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
  
  
  # fullish model
  fullish_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(fullish_model))
  summary_model <- summary(fullish_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "fullish") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
    


}
```

```{r cingulate-all-electrodes}
}
```

```{r ofc-regressions}
    mutate(model = "threat") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # aac model
  aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # reward model
  reward_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + Direction + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_model))
  summary_model <- summary(reward_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## Interaction
  
  ## threat, aac
  threat_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(threat_aac_model))
  summary_model <- summary(threat_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "threat_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  ## reward, aac
  reward_aac_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ discounted_reward*towards_ghost +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation +
                            (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(reward_aac_model))  
  summary_model <- summary(reward_aac_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "reward_aac") %>%
    mutate(file = file)%>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)  
  
  # full model
  full_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + towards_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(full_model))
  summary_model <- summary(full_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "full") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
  
    # fullish model
  fullish_model <- lmerTest::lmer(theta ~ distance_to_ghost + discounted_reward +
                             UserLocation + GhostLocation + 
                               (1|trial_numeric), data = elec_full_data)
  print(summary(fullish_model))
  summary_model <- summary(fullish_model) 
  
  tmp <- as_tibble(summary_model$coefficients) %>%
    mutate(model = "fullish") %>%
    mutate(file = file) %>%
    mutate(predictor = rownames(summary_model$coefficients))
  
  slchool2_trial_theta_results <- rbind(slchool2_trial_theta_results, tmp)
    


}
```

```{r mtg-all-electrodes}

shift <- 0
hc_elecs <- list.files(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "mtg", "SLCH002"))

elec_full_data_mtg_elecs <- NULL
for(file in hc_elecs){

  print(file)
  
  elec_theta_data <- read_csv(path(here(), "data", "theta_csvs", "mtg", "SLCH002", file))
  
   # fix col names
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    select(-X1)
  colnames(elec_theta_data) <- c(paste0("bin_", colnames(elec_theta_data)[1:181]), 'trial_numeric')
  
  # pivot
  elec_theta_data <- elec_theta_data %>%
    pivot_longer(names_to = 'bin', values_to = 'theta', cols = starts_with("bin")) %>%
    mutate(bin = as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>%
    mutate(bin = paste0("bin_", if_else(bin - shift > -1, bin - shift, 999))) %>%
    filter(bin != "bin_999") %>%
    mutate(trial_numeric = trial_numeric + 1) %>%
    mutate(trial_time = .05 * as.numeric(gsub("bin_", "", bin))) %>% 
    mutate(trial_time = as.character(round(trial_time, 3)))  %>% 
    select(-bin)
    
  
  # merge 
  elec_full_data <- inner_join(elec_theta_data, sl02_data_distance)
  
  elec_full_data <- elec_full_data %>%
     mutate(trial_numeric = factor(trial_numeric)) %>%
    mutate(electrode = file)
  
  # rbind
  elec_full_data_mtg_elecs <- rbind(elec_full_data_mtg_elecs, elec_full_data)

}

elec_full_data_mtg_elecs <- elec_full_data_mtg_elecs %>%
```
